comments.author: deletesoftware+moz@yandex.ru
comments.text:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Don’t know or don’t remember that, to drag an app icon, you need to click it and wait for it to become detached from the page’s “surface”.
2. Have only one app icon on the whole dashboard or on several consecutive pages.
3. Click and drag the app icon (far or not so far).

Actual results:
* The icon can be dragged horizontally, although not vertically.
* The icon won’t stay where you “drop” it (you don’t know it’s not actually dropping).
* If you managed to create multiple pages, then if you “drop” the icon on the wrong side of the dashboard, it can slide away. When there are only two pages, it is not obvious what those black and white circles are. See also bug 707236, which can make it even more confusing.
